select id, name, img, now_price, total_sales, stock from goods where name like concat('%', #{goodsName}, '%')
order by total_star desc
order by total_sales desc
order by min_price asc

select id, name,info_url, img, now_price, total_sales, stock,star1,star2,star3,total_star, (select group_concat(url) from goods_img where a.id=goods_id and is_delete=0 order by sort desc )as banner_images from goods as a where a.id=#{id} and a.is_delete=0

select c.* from goods_specification as a inner join specification as b on FIND_IN_SET(b.id,a.ids) and b.is_delete=0 inner join specification as c on b.parent_id=c.id and c.is_delete=0 where a.is_delete=0 and a.goods_id=#{goodsId} group by c.id

select b.* from goods_specification as a inner join specification as b on FIND_IN_SET(b.id,a.ids) and b.is_delete=0 and b.parent_id=#{parentId} where a.is_delete=0 and a.goods_id=#{goodsId} group by b.id
